title: The rehabilitation tenement shall be jointly owned by the Pramukh hutment dweller and the spouse, if applicable
clause_text: The rehabilitation tenement shall be jointly owned by the Pramukh hutment dweller and the spouse, if applicable. The details of ownership including Share Certificate and other relevant documents, shall be so entered and shall be deemed to be so entered in the records of the Co-operative Housing Society. The membership of the Co-operative Housing Society should be finalized based on eligibility criteria as per the provisions of the said Regulations and as specified by C.E.O., S.R.A.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
